## Catalog Description

Semester course; 3 lecture hours. 3 credits. Introduction to ethical considerations for computing and working with data, legal implications surrounding data and computational systems, and sociotechnical responsibilities.

(none)

Introduction to ethical considerations for computing and working with data, legal implications surrounding data and computational systems, and sociotechnical responsibilities.

## Topics

ethics, Legal implications, sociotechnical responsibilities
